ONBOARDING_SCREEN.ONBOARDING_1_TITlE: All your Bitcoin, Stacks assets and NFTs in one place
ONBOARDING_SCREEN.ONBOARDING_1_SUBTITlE: Manage all your Bitcoin and Stacks based digital assets directly from Xverse
ONBOARDING_SCREEN.ONBOARDING_2_TITlE: Stack your STX to earn rewards in Bitcoin
ONBOARDING_SCREEN.ONBOARDING_2_SUBTITlE: Earn Bitcoin yield on your STX without them ever leaving your wallet.
ONBOARDING_SCREEN.ONBOARDING_3_TITlE: Access your favorites Dapps from your wallet
ONBOARDING_SCREEN.ONBOARDING_3_SUBTITlE: From marketplaces to DeFi, and so much more.

LEDGER_IMPORT_SCREEN.LEDGER_IMPORT_1_SUBTITLE: Using a Ledger hardware wallet with your Orange Wallet is the most secure way to store your Bitcoin and other digital assets.
LEDGER_IMPORT_SCREEN.LEDGER_IMPORT_2_SUBTITLE: Select the assets you would like to manage with this wallet.
LEDGER_IMPORT_SCREEN.LEDGER_IMPORT_2_FOOTNOTE: If you don’t want to set a Stacks address now, you have the possibility to set it up later.

LEDGER_CONNECT.BTC_SUBTITLE: To continue, connect your Ledger device, make sure it's unlocked, and open the Bitcoin app.
LEDGER_CONNECT.STX_SUBTITLE: To continue, connect your Ledger device, make sure it's unlocked, and open the Stacks app.
LEDGER_CONNECT.BTC_SUBTITLE_FAILED: Make sure your Ledger device is connected, unlocked, authorized by your browser and the Bitcoin app is open.
LEDGER_CONNECT.STX_SUBTITLE_FAILED: Make sure your Ledger device is connected, unlocked, authorized by your browser and the Stacks app is open.

LEDGER_ADD_ADDRESS.SUBTITLE: This is the address generated by the hardware wallet. Verify that this address matches the address displayed on your device.
LEDGER_ADD_ADDRESS.ALERT: Verify that these addresses match the addresses displayed on the device.
LEDGER_ADD_ADDRESS.ALREADY_CONNECTED_WARNING: An account has already been added to your wallet from this device. Would you like to create a new account?
LEDGER_ADD_ADDRESS.CONFIRM_TO_CONTINUE: Confirm on your device to continue.
LEDGER_ADD_ADDRESS.SUBTITLE_CANCELLED: The account import process was cancelled on the device.

LEDGER_ADDRESS_ADDED.SUBTITLE: You can now receive & send Bitcoin, Ordinals and BRC-20 tokens using Xverse and Ledger.
LEDGER_ADDRESS_ADDED.SUBTITLE_STX: You can now receive & send STX, Stacks NFTs and SIP-10 tokens using Xverse and Ledger.

LEDGER_ADD_ACCOUNT_NAME.TITLE: Name your Ledger wallet
LEDGER_ADD_ACCOUNT_NAME.SUBTITLE: You can give your wallet a custom name.

ERRORS.MAX_LENGTH: Account name should not be longer than {{number}} characters.
ERRORS.ALREADY_EXISTS: Account with the same name already exists. Please choose another name.

LEDGER_IMPORT_END.TITLE: Your wallet is ready!
LEDGER_IMPORT_END.SUBTITLE: You can switch to this wallet from the accounts selection drop-down.

LEDGER_STX_WALLET_ADDED.TITLE: Stacks wallet added
LEDGER_STX_WALLET_ADDED.SUBTITLE: You can now receive & send STX, Stacks NFTs and SIP-10 tokens using this wallet.

LEDGER_BEFORE_GETTING_STARTED.TITLE: Before getting started
LEDGER_BEFORE_GETTING_STARTED.DESCRIPTION: Do you use Ledger Live with the hardware wallet device you wish to connect?

OPTIONS.USE_LEDGER_LIVE: I use Ledger Live with the device.
OPTIONS.DONT_USE_LEDGER_LIVE: I do not use Ledger Live with the device.

IMPORTANT_WARNING.TITLE: Important - Please read
IMPORTANT_WARNING.TEXT_1: It is not recommended to use Xverse and Ledger Live, or other Bitcoin wallets with the same hardware device as this could lead to unintentional transfers of Ordinals.
IMPORTANT_WARNING.TEXT_2: You should use a separate device for Xverse and Ordinals or set a passphrase on your Ledger to create a different set of accounts for Xverse. See
IMPORTANT_WARNING.TEXT_3: Only continue if you're an advanced user and you know what you're doing. Do not create and use a taproot address on Ledger Live if you are using Xverse.
IMPORTANT_WARNING.PASSPHRASE_FOR_ORDINALS: How To Set A Passphrase For Ordinals
IMPORTANT_WARNING.UNDERSTAND_THE_RISKS: I understand the risks and wish to continue anyway
IMPORTANT_WARNING.UNDERSTAND_SHOULD_NOT_USE_LEDGER_LIVE: I understand I should not use Ledger Live or other Bitcoin wallets with the same hardware device

LEDGER_IMPORT_SCREEN.ADDRESS_MISMATCH: The DAPP requesting your wallet address is expecting a different address. Please switch your account address back or disconnect and reconnect your wallet from the DAPP.

LEDGER_VERIFY_SCREEN.SUBTITLE_VERIFY: Verify that this address matches the address displayed on your device.
LEDGER_VERIFY_SCREEN.BTC_RECEIVE_MESSAGE: Do not send Ordinals to this address, use your Ordinals NFT receive address.
LEDGER_VERIFY_SCREEN.ORDINALS_RECEIVE_MESSAGE: Only send Ordinals and BRC-20 tokens to this address.
LEDGER_VERIFY_SCREEN.STX_RECEIVE_MESSAGE: Only send SIP-010 tokens to this address
LEDGER_VERIFY_SCREEN.SUBTITLE_CANCELLED: The account address was rejected on the device.
LEDGER_VERIFY_SCREEN.BTC_SUBTITLE_FAILED: Make sure your Ledger device is connected, unlocked, authorized by your browser and the Bitcoin app is open.
LEDGER_VERIFY_SCREEN.STX_SUBTITLE_FAILED: Make sure your Ledger device is connected, unlocked, authorized by your browser and the Stacks app is open.
LEDGER_VERIFY_SCREEN.WRONG_DEVICE_ERROR_SUBTITLE: The public key of the connected device did not match the wallet public key. Make sure you have the correct device connected.
LEDGER_VERIFY_SCREEN.ADDRESS_MISMATCH: There’s a mismatch between the address you’re verifying and the address you’re logged with.

LEDGER_CONNECT.BTC_SUBTITLE: Ensure your device is connected, unlocked, and the Bitcoin app is open to continue.
LEDGER_CONNECT.STX_SUBTITLE: Ensure your device is connected, unlocked, and the Stacks app is open to continue.

CONNECT.TITLE: Connect your Hardware Wallet
CONNECT.SUBTITLE: Connect and unlock your device to continue.
CONNECT.BTC_SUBTITLE: Ensure your device is connected, unlocked, and the Bitcoin app is open to continue.
CONNECT.STX_SUBTITLE: Ensure your device is connected, unlocked, and the Stacks app is open to continue.
CONNECT.ERROR_SUBTITLE: Unable to connect to your device.
CONNECT.BTC_ERROR_SUBTITLE: Please ensure your device is connected, unlocked, authorized by your browser, and the Bitcoin app is open.
CONNECT.STX_ERROR_SUBTITLE: Please ensure your device is connected, unlocked, authorized by your browser, and the Stacks app is open.
CONNECT.WRONG_DEVICE_ERROR_SUBTITLE: The public key of the connected device did not match the wallet public key. Make sure you have the correct device connected.

EXTERNAL_INPUTS.TITLE: External Inputs
EXTERNAL_INPUTS.SUBTITLE: Your device may display a warning regarding external inputs. This is expected as you'll be signing inputs from two addresses in one transaction.

CONFIRM.TITLE: Confirm Transaction
CONFIRM.SUBTITLE: Please confirm the transaction on your device to continue.

ORDINAL_TX.ORDINAL_SUBTITLE: Please confirm the Ordinal inscription transfer on your device.
ORDINAL_TX.BTC_SUBTITLE: Please confirm the transaction fee payment from your device.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Transaction Sent
SUCCESS.SUBTITLE: Your transaction has been successfully sent to the blockchain.
SUCCESS.BRC20_INFO: The inscription may several hours to appear in your wallet. Once received, head to your collectible dashboard and send it to your recipient to complete the token transfer.

DASHBOARD_SCREEN.REMOVE_FROM_LIST_DESCRIPTION: This will disconnect and remove the account from Xverse. You can import the same account again later by reconnecting your hardware wallet device.

DATA_COLLECTION_POPUP.TITLE: Help us improve Xverse!
DATA_COLLECTION_POPUP.DESCRIPTION: Help improve the app experience, by allowing Xverse to collect anonymized usage data. This data cannot be used to identify your wallet individually.

TOKEN_SCREEN.CONTENT: Add support for more tokens to your Orange Wallet by enabling them below.

ACCOUNT_SCREEN.CONTENT: Add new wallet addresses by simply tapping the add button below.

RECEIVE.STX_ADDRESS_DESC: Only use this address to receive SIP-010 tokens.
RECEIVE.ORDINALS_RECEIVE_MESSAGE: Only use this address to receive Ordinals and BRC-20 tokens.
RECEIVE.STX_RECEIVE_MESSAGE: Only use this address to receive SIP-010 tokens.
RECEIVE.BTC_RECEIVE_MESSAGE: Only use this address to receive Bitcoin. Do not send Ordinals or any other protocols to this address.

SEND.MEMO_INFO: Please note that a memo can increase transaction fees.
SEND.WARNING_MSG: Please confirm the wallet address as transactions are irreversible and funds can not be recovered.

ERRORS.SEND_TO_SELF: You can not send funds to yourself.
ERRORS.BELOW_MINIMUM_AMOUNT: Amount needs to be greater than 1500 sats.
ERRORS.NFT_SEND_DETAIL: The NFT has already been sent and is pending.
ERRORS.ORDINAL_NOT_OWNED: This ordinal is not owned by this account

INFO.ADDRESS_SUPPORTS_RARE_SATS: Please ensure the recipient address supports Rare Sats.

SEND.MAKE_SURE_THE_RECIPIENT: Please confirm the Ordinals wallet address as transactions are irreversible and funds can not be recovered.
SEND.SEND_BRC20_ORDINAL_WALLET_WARNING: Transferring this Ordinal inscription will also transfer your BRC-20 tokens.
SEND.SEND_ORDINAL_TO_SELF_WARNING: You are sending Ordinals to yourself. Please confirm.
SEND.SEND_BRC20_ORDINAL_TO_SELF_WARNING: You are sending BRC-20 tokens to yourself. Please confirm.
SEND.SEND_BTC_TO_SELF_WARNING: You are sending BTC to yourself. Please confirm.
SEND.YOU_ARE_TRANSFERRING_TO_YOURSELF: You are sending to yourself. Please confirm.

CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.CONFIRM_DESCRIPTION: Please carefully review the details of your send request.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.SPONSORED_TX_INFO: This transaction is sponsored and no transaction fees will be taken from your wallet.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.NETWORK_MISMATCH: The DAPP requesting your wallet address is expecting a different network. Please switch your network to Mainnet to proceed. Disconnect and reconnect your wallet from the DAPP if needed.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.ADDRESS_MISMATCH: The DAPP requesting your wallet address is expecting a different address. Please switch your account address back or disconnect and reconnect your wallet from the DAPP.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.PSBT_NO_BROADCAST_DISCLAIMER: This transaction will not be broadcasted from your wallet and can be broadcasted by a tird party at a later date.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.PSBT_CANT_PARSE_ERROR_DESCRIPTION: The requested transaction is invalid and cannot be processed. Please contact the company of the requesting dAPP for support.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.SCRIPT_OUTPUT_TX: This transaction contains a script output. Please ensure that you trust the source of this transaction before proceeding.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.ORDINAL_DETECTED_WARNING: An Ordinal inscription has been detected in this transaction. By continuing, your Ordinal will be transferred.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.BTC_TRANSFER_DANGER_ALERT_DESC: You are about to transfer Bitcoin which contains an ordinal inscription. Once transferred, the transaction is irreversible and funds can not be recovered.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.HIGH_FEE_WARNING_TEXT: The estimated transaction fee for this transaction is much higher than normal.

CONNECT.TITLE: Connect your Hardware Wallet
CONNECT.SUBTITLE: Please plug in and unlock your device to continue.
CONNECT.ERROR_SUBTITLE: We are not able to connect to your device.

CONFIRM.TITLE: Confirm the Transaction
CONFIRM.SUBTITLE: Please confirm the transaction on your device to continue.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Transaction Sent
SUCCESS.SUBTITLE: Your transaction has been successfully sent to the blockchain.

TX_ERRORS.INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE: The requested transaction cannot proceed due to insufficient funds.

TRANSACTION_SETTING.FEE_INFO: A faster confirmation on the network is achieved by increasing the transaction fee.
TRANSACTION_SETTING.NONCE_INFO: Apply a custom nonce to replace a pending transaction with the same nonce.
TRANSACTION_SETTING.SAME_FEE_ERROR: The new fee must be greater than the current fee.
TRANSACTION_SETTING.GREATER_FEE_ERROR: Requested fee is greater than your available balance.
TRANSACTION_SETTING.LOWER_THAN_MINIMUM: Requested fee is below the minimum.
TRANSACTION_SETTING.NONCE_WARNING: Please note that entering an incorrect nonce can result in a failed transaction.

TRANSACTION_STATUS.SUCCESS_MSG: Your transaction has been successfully sent to the blockchain.
TRANSACTION_STATUS.SPONSORED_MSG: This transaction will be broadcasted by the sponsor.
TRANSACTION_STATUS.BRC20_ORDINAL_MSG: The inscription may several hours to appear in your wallet. Once received, head to your collectible dashboard and send it to your recipient to complete the token transfer.
TRANSACTION_STATUS.SPONSOR_SERVICE_ERROR: If the issue persist, try again at a later time, or uncheck the “Sponsor Transaction” option in the swap details.

LEGAL_SCREEN.SCREEN_SUBTITLE: Please review the Orange Wallet Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.

AUTHORIZE_DATA_COLLECTION.TITLE: Authorize data collection
AUTHORIZE_DATA_COLLECTION.DESCRIPTION: We would like to collect anonymous usage data to better understand users and improve the app. You can change this setting at any time.

BACKUP_WALLET_SCREEN.SCREEN_SUBTITLE: Your seed phrase is the unique key that allows you to recover your Bitcoin wallet. Backing up your wallet is highly recommended.
BACKUP_WALLET_SCREEN.SEED_PHRASE_VIEW_HEADING: Enter the requested words in the order of your seed phrase to confirm it is correct.
BACKUP_WALLET_SCREEN.SEED_PHRASE_VERIFY_HEADING: Enter the requested words in the order of your seed phrase to confirm it is correct.
BACKUP_WALLET_SCREEN.SEED_PHRASE_DEC_SETTINGS: Record and store your seed phrase in a secure place where only you have access.

CREATE_PASSWORD_SCREEN.TEXT_INPUT_NEW_PASSWORD_LABEL: Enter the password you would like to set for your wallet.
CREATE_PASSWORD_SCREEN.TEXT_INPUT_CONFIRM_PASSWORD_LABEL: Re-enter the password to confirm the password for your wallet.
CREATE_PASSWORD_SCREEN.PASSWORD_STRENGTH_ERROR: Your password should be at least 9 characters long. Use a mix of uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols.

WALLET_SUCCESS_SCREEN.SCREEN_SUBTITLE: Your new Bitcoin wallet has successfully been created. Tap to learn more.
WALLET_SUCCESS_SCREEN.RESTORE_SCREEN_SUBTITLE: Your wallet has been successfully restored.
WALLET_SUCCESS_SCREEN.SELF_CUSTODY_DESC: Your assets are securely stored on the blockchain and only you have access to your encrypted keys.
WALLET_SUCCESS_SCREEN.PRIVATE_DESC: No personal information is ever collected and no data is stored on any servers.
WALLET_SUCCESS_SCREEN.ANONYMOUS_DESC: Your identity is completely anonymous with no personal information linked to your wallet.
WALLET_SUCCESS_SCREEN.DECENTRALIZED_DESC: Your transactions are completely decentralized and peer-to-peer. No 3rd parties allowed.

WALLET_EXISTS_SCREEN.SCREEN_SUBTITLE: A wallet was created or restored in another tab. Any seed phrases generated in this tab are not valid. Please create a new wallet or restore your wallet from a seed phrase.

CONNECT.TITLE: Connect Your Ledger
CONNECT.SUBTITLE: Ensure your device is connected, unlocked, and the Stacks app is open to continue.
CONNECT.ERROR_SUBTITLE: Unable to connect to your device.

CONFIRM.TITLE: Confirm the Signature
CONFIRM.SUBTITLE: Authorise the signature on your device to continue.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Signature confirmed
SUCCESS.SUBTITLE: This transaction will be broadcasted by the sponsor.

FORGOT_PASSWORD_SCREEN.TITLE: Forgot Password
FORGOT_PASSWORD_SCREEN.PARAGRAPH: The Orange Wallet does not store any passwords, seed phrases, or any user data. If you have forgotten your password, you will need reset your wallet and re-enter your seed phrase to recover your Bitcoin wallet. Always have your seed phrase backed up and stored in a safe location.
FORGOT_PASSWORD_SCREEN.BACKUP_CHECKBOX_LABEL: My seed phrase is backed up.

RESTORE_WALLET_SCREEN.ENTER_SEED_HEADER: Enter the requested words in the order of your seed phrase to confirm it is correct.

STACKING_SCREEN.STACKING_INFO: Pool your STX with other stackers to earn real BTC with low minimums. Rewards are distributed after the end of every 2-week cycle.
STACKING_SCREEN.STACK_FOR_REWARD: Stack your coins to earn rewards
STACKING_SCREEN.XVERSE_POOL: Xverse delegated pooling allows everyone to participate in Stacking and earn rewards.

NFT_DASHBOARD_SCREEN.ACTIVATE_ORDINALS_INFO: You have Bitcoin Ordinals in your wallet. Activate to display them.

RARITY_DETAIL.TOP_TEXT: Currently, only the default rarity scale is supported. Your sats could have other attributes.
RARITY_DETAIL.UNCOMMON: The first sat of each block.
RARITY_DETAIL.RARE: The first sat of each difficulty adjustment period.
RARITY_DETAIL.EPIC: The first sat of each halving epoch.
RARITY_DETAIL.LEGENDARY: The first sat of each cycle.
RARITY_DETAIL.MYTHIC: The first sat of the genesis block.
RARITY_DETAIL.RARITY_INFO: Currently, only the default rarity scale is supported. Your sats could have other attributes.

NFT_DASHBOARD_SCREEN.NEW_FEAT_RARE_SATS_DESCRIPTION: Enable rare sats to display unique sats in your wallet. You can change this setting at any time.
NFT_DASHBOARD_SCREEN.NEW_FEAT_RARE_SATS_ORDINALS_ENABLE: Enable rare sats to display unique sats in your wallet. You can change this setting at any time.
NFT_DASHBOARD_SCREEN.RARE_SATS_NOTICE_DETAIL: The Orange Wallet only supports the Rodarmor rarity index. Your sats contain other attributes.
NFT_DASHBOARD_SCREEN.FROM_RARE_SAT_BUNDLE: This inscription belongs to the same bundle as other assets. Transferring it will involve transferring the entire bundle.

RESTORE_FUND_SCREEN.TITLE: Restore Assets
RESTORE_FUND_SCREEN.DESCRIPTION: If you accidentally sent Ordinals to your Bitcoin address or vice-versa sent Bitcoin to your Ordinals address, press the button below to restore them.
RESTORE_FUND_SCREEN.RECOVER_BTC_DESC: If you sent Bitcoin to your Ordinals address.
RESTORE_FUND_SCREEN.RECOVER_ORDINALS_DESC: If you sent Ordinals to your Bitcoin payment address.

RESTORE_BTC_SCREEN.TITLE: Restore BTC
RESTORE_BTC_SCREEN.DESCRIPTION: You have Bitcoin stored in your ordinal address. Transfer them to your payment address for use.

RESTORE_ORDINAL_SCREEN.TITLE: Restore Ordinals
RESTORE_ORDINAL_SCREEN.DESCRIPTION: You have Ordinals stored in your Bitcoin payment address. Transfer them to your Ordinals address for use.

NFT_DETAIL_SCREEN.NAME: Name
NFT_DETAIL_SCREEN.CREATOR: Creator
NFT_DETAIL_SCREEN.ORDINAL_PENDING_SEND_DESCRIPTION: This Ordinal is already in a pending transfer.
NFT_DETAIL_SCREEN.RARE_SATS_BUNDLE_DESCRIPTION: This inscription belongs to the same bundle as other assets.

RESET_WALLET_SCREEN.ENTER_PASSWORD: Enter your password to reset your wallet

SETTING_SCREEN.CONTENT: Adjust your wallet settings below to personalize your experience.
SETTING_SCREEN.CURRENCY_CONTENT: Easily switch between various fiat currencies by selecting the currency below.
SETTING_SCREEN.NETWORK_CONTENT: Easily switch between Mainnet and Testnet by selecting the below.
SETTING_SCREEN.RESET_WALLET_CONTENT: The Orange Wallet does not store any passwords, seed phrases, or any user data. If you have forgotten your password, you will need reset your wallet and re-enter your seed phrase to recover your Bitcoin wallet. Always have your seed phrase backed up and stored in a safe location.
SETTING_SCREEN.RESET_WALLET_DESCRIPTION: This will reset your wallet from this browser. Please ensure your seed phrase is backed up.
SETTING_SCREEN.ENTER_PASSWORD: Enter your password to reset your wallet
SETTING_SCREEN.LOCK_COUNTDOWN_TITLE: Select the duration of time the wallet is inactive before the wallet locks automatically.
SETTING_SCREEN.ENABLE_RARE_SATS_DETAIL: Automatically scan and display rare sats in your Ordinals wallet.

BUY_SCREEN.PURCHASE_CRYPTO: Buy crypto from our trusted partners.
BUY_SCREEN.THIRD_PARTY_WARNING: You will be redirected to our partner service provider to complete the purchase. Please contant the partner directly if you encounter any issues.

POST_CONDITION_MESSAGE.TRANSFER_GREATER_EQUAL: will transfer equal to or greater than
POST_CONDITION_MESSAGE.TRANSFER_LESS_EQUAL: will transfer less than or equal to

CONTRACT_CALL_REQUEST.POST_CONDITION_ALERT: Besides fees, transfers will not be made from your account.

DEPLOY_CONTRACT_REQUEST.POST_CONDITION_ALERT: Besides fees, transfers will not be made from your account.

SIGNATURE_REQUEST.TITLE: Sign Message
SIGNATURE_REQUEST.DESCRIPTION: Signing a message authorizes this website to access your wallet. No transactions are broadcasted and zero fees are taken during this process.
SIGNATURE_REQUEST.ACTION_DISCLAIMER: Transactions will not be broadcasted and no fees will be applied.
SIGNATURE_REQUEST.SIGNING_WARNING: By signing this message, you acknowledge that you are the owner of an account. This signature cannot be used to send transactions on your behalf. Please only sign messages for transactions that you trust.

NO_STACKS_AUTH_SUPPORT.TITLE: This wallet does not have a Stacks address.

CONNECT.TITLE: Connect Your Ledger
CONNECT.SUBTITLE: Please ensure your device is connected, unlocked, and open the {{name}} app to continue.
CONNECT.ERROR_SUBTITLE: Unable to connect to your device.

CONFIRM.TITLE: Confirm the signature
CONFIRM.SUBTITLE: Authorise the signature on your device to continue.
CONFIRM.ERROR_SUBTITLE: The signature request encountered an error. Please check that your Ledger Bitcoin app is version 2.1.3 or newer.

DENIED.ERROR_SUBTITLE: The signature has been rejected. You can try again or close this tab.

INVALID.ERROR_SUBTITLE: Your Ledger device has rejected the message stating it is invalid.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Signature confirmed
SUCCESS.SUBTITLE: This transaction will be broadcasted by the sponsor.

COMPLETE.MESSAGE: Your ordinal has been successfully inscribed and will appear soon.

LONG.INVALID_JSON_CONTENT: The content is not valid JSON. Please verify the content of your inscription.
LONG.INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS: You have insufficient funds to process this transaction. Please add more funds to your wallet or try again with a lower fee rate.
LONG.INVALID_FEE_RATE: The fee applied to this transaction is too low. To apply a higher fee, select edit fees at the bottom of this screen.
LONG.INVALID_SERVICE_FEE_CONFIG: The calling application sent an invalid payload. Please contact the application developer.
LONG.INVALID_CONTENT: The ordinal content you are trying to inscribe is not valid. Please verify the content of your inscription.
LONG.CONTENT_TOO_BIG: The ordinal you are trying to inscribe is too large. Try reducing the weight of your content.
LONG.INSCRIPTION_VALUE_TOO_LOW: The calling application sent an invalid payload. Please contact the application developer.
LONG.FAILED_TO_FINALIZE: The inscription transaction failed to finalize. Please try again or contact support.
LONG.SERVER_ERROR: An unknown server error occurred. Please try again or contact support.

ERROR_SCREEN.TITLE: Significant Wallet Error
ERROR_SCREEN.ERROR_DESCRIPTION: The Orange Wallet encountered a fatal error. Please restart your wallet.
ERROR_SCREEN.SUPPORT: If the issue persists, you can contact the support at support@1337labs.com

WINDOW_CLOSED_ALERT.TITLE: Requesting Window Closed
WINDOW_CLOSED_ALERT.BODY: The window that initiated the request has been closed; however, you can still broadcast the transaction.

ADDRESS_RECEIVE_ALERT_MESSAGE.RECEIVING_ORDINAL_INFO: Your address was copied. Do not send Bitcoin to this address. Only send BRC20 tokens and Ordinals NFTs to this address.
ADDRESS_RECEIVE_ALERT_MESSAGE.RECEIVING_BTC_INFO: Your Bitcoin address was copied. Do not send BRC20 tokens and Ordinals NFTs to this address.
ADDRESS_RECEIVE_ALERT_MESSAGE.DO_NOT_SHOW_MESSAGE: Do not show this message again.

SELECT_BTC_ADDRESS_SCREEN.TITLE: Connect Request
SELECT_BTC_ADDRESS_SCREEN.NETWORK_MISMATCH_ERROR_DESCRIPTION: The DAPP requesting your wallet address is expecting a different network. Please switch your network to Mainnet to proceed. Disconnect and reconnect your wallet from the DAPP if needed.

SEND_BRC20.SEND_INFO_SUBTITLE: To transfer BRC-20 tokens, you need to make two separate transactions:
SEND_BRC20.SEND_STEP_1: Create an Ordinal inscription with the token and amount you would like to send.
SEND_BRC20.SEND_STEP_2: Once you have the transfer inscription, you can send it to your recipient to transfer the BRC-20 token.
SEND_BRC20.MAKE_SURE_THE_RECIPIENT: Please confirm the recipient wallet is a BRC-20 address as transactions are irreversible and funds can not be recovered.
SEND_BRC20.YOU_ARE_TRANSFERRING_TO_YOURSELF: You are sending to yourself. Please confirm.

EXECUTE_BRC20.YOUR_TRANSACTION_HAS_BEEN: Your transaction has been successfully submitted.

CACHE_MIGRATION_SCREEN.TITLE: Your wallet data store needs to be updated in order to remain secure.
CACHE_MIGRATION_SCREEN.WARNING: Please make sure you have your seed phrase backed up securely and restore your wallet by locking your wallet and tapping the Forgot Password link.

SWAP_SCREEN.SLIPPAGE_DESC: Your transaction will reverse if the price changes unfavorably by more of this percentage.
SWAP_SCREEN.SWAP_TRANSACTION_CANNOT_BE_SPONSORED: Swap transaction cannot be sponsored while you have a pending transaction.

SWAP_CONFIRM_SCREEN.THIS_IS_A_SPONSORED_TRANSACTION: This transaction is sponsored and no transaction fees will be taken from your wallet.
SWAP_CONFIRM_SCREEN.SWAP_TRANSACTION_CANNOT_BE_SPONSORED: A sponsored swap transaction can not proceed while you have a pending transaction.

RARE_SATS.SEND_INDIVIDUAL_SAT_INFO: Rare Sats and inscriptions in the same bundle cannot be sent separately.
RARE_SATS.BUNDLE_PENDING_SEND_DESCRIPTION: This bundle is already in a pending transfer.
